    Owner

    Gets the owner of the card.

    Declaration
    int? Owner { get; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    int?

    The Number who owns the card.
    If it doesn't have one, or a dependent object is uninitialized, null.

    OwnerHandIndex

    Gets the index of the card's place in its owner's Hand.

    Declaration
    int? OwnerHandIndex { get; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    int?

    The index of Hand containing the card.
    If there isn't one, or a dependent object is uninitialized, null.
